verses.verse: And seven <S%H7651><s%> women <S%H802><s%> shall take hold <S%H2388><s%> of one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, We will eat <S%H398><s%> our own bread <S%H3899><s%>, and wear <S%H3847><s%> our own apparel <S%H8071><s%>: only let us be called <S%H7121><s%> by thy name <S%H8034><s%>; take thou away <S%H622><s%> our reproach <S%H2781><s%>.

In that day <S%H3117><s%> shall the branch <S%H6780><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> be beautiful <S%H6643><s%> and glorious <S%H3519><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> shall be excellent <S%H1347><s%> and comely for <S%H8597><s%> them that are escaped <S%H6413><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And it shall come to pass <S%H7604><s%>, that he that is left in Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and he that remaineth <S%H3498><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, shall be called <S%H559><s%> holy <S%H6918><s%>, even every one that is written <S%H3789><s%> among the living <S%H2416><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>;

when the Lord <S%H136><s%> shall have washed away <S%H7364><s%> the filth <S%H6675><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and shall have purged <S%H1740><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> from the midst <S%H7130><s%> thereof <S%H7307><s%>, by the spirit of justice <S%H4941><s%>, and by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of burning <S%H1197><s%>.

And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will create <S%H1254><s%> over the whole habitation <S%H4349><s%> of mount <S%H2022><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%>, and over her assemblies <S%H4744><s%>, a cloud <S%H6051><s%> and smoke <S%H6227><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, and the shining <S%H5051><s%> of a flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>; for over all the glory <S%H3519><s%> shall be spread a covering <S%H2646><s%>.

And there shall be a pavilion <S%H5521><s%> for a shade <S%H6738><s%> in the day-time <S%H3119><s%> from the heat <S%H2721><s%>, and for a refuge <S%H4268><s%> and for a covert <S%H4563><s%> from storm <S%H2230><s%> and from rain <S%H4306><s%>.
